title: JavaScript Essentials
description: Master JavaScript and create interactive web apps.

chapters.title: Overview
chapters.description: This course covers the fundamental concepts of JavaScript, the programming language of the web. You will learn how to add interactivity to websites, understand core programming concepts such as variables, functions, loops, and events, and work with the Document Object Model (DOM). By the end of the course, you will be able to create dynamic web pages and write clean, efficient JavaScript code.

chapters.title: Introduction to JavaScript
chapters.description: Get started with JavaScript and understand its purpose.

chapters.title: Variables and Data Types
chapters.description: Learn how to declare variables and understand JavaScript data types.

chapters.title: Functions and Scope
chapters.description: Explore how functions work and how scope affects variables.

chapters.title: Control Structures
chapters.description: Understand how to control the flow of your code using conditions and loops.

chapters.title: Objects and Arrays
chapters.description: Learn how to use objects and arrays to store collections of data.

chapters.title: DOM Manipulation
chapters.description: Interact with the Document Object Model to dynamically change web pages.

chapters.title: ES6 and Beyond
chapters.description: Discover new features in modern JavaScript.

chapters.title: Asynchronous JavaScript
chapters.description: Learn how to handle asynchronous operations with callbacks, promises, and async/await.

chapters.title: Error Handling and Debugging
chapters.description: Handle errors gracefully and debug JavaScript code.

lessons.title: Using the Browser Console for Debugging

chapters.title: Project: Create an Interactive To-Do List
chapters.description: Apply your knowledge to build a dynamic to-do list app.

prerequisites: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS.
learningOutcomes: Manipulate the DOM to create dynamic web pages.
Handle asynchronous operations with promises and async/await.
Develop and deploy a functional JavaScript-based to-do list app.
